Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-40250 affecting package kernel for versions less than 6.6.119.3-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-40250 affecting package kernel for versions less than 6.6.119.3-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package kernel is earlier than 6.6.119.3-1, affected by CVE-2025-40250
